title: Jeb: 生物群系的名字仅仅用于调试
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-8-19 22:40 编辑 

Kegan：Why are the big redwood forest biomes called Mega Taigas? Those dont even exist. You should get some new wood types and changed that!
Kegan：为什么红木森林生物群系叫做Mega Taigas呢？那个名字甚至不能存在。你应该开发一些新的木头种类然后更改名字！
Jeb：The biome names are in truth only used for debug reasons. It's the same with "roofed forests" and "ice spikes", and so on
Jeb：事实上，生物群系的名字仅仅用于调试而已。这和“黑森林”、“冰刺之地”以及更多的生物群系是一样的原因
